definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Don't form an undisciplined way of life.
sentences.chinese: 不要養成散漫的生活作風。

sentences.english: You will be more progressive and effective in day-to-day life style .
sentences.chinese: 你會更進步的和有效的在日常的生活作風。

sentences.english: The leading cadres' fine life-style relates to the cause of the Party success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 領導幹部的生活作風關係到黨的事業成敗。

sentences.english: He swiftly lost the fastidiousness which had characterized his old life.
sentences.chinese: 巴克很快便失去了往日那種過分講究的生活作風。

sentences.english: The life-style of leading carders forms a great part in the construction of the Party style.
sentences.chinese: 領導幹部的生活作風是事關黨風建設的大事。
